thread.title: Writer of Netflix’s New Series “Dear White People” Has a BIG Secret…
thread.title_full: Writer of Netflix’s New Series “Dear White People” Has a BIG Secret…

author: EdJenner
title: Writer of Netflix’s New Series “Dear White People” Has a BIG Secret…
text:
Go to Article 
Earlier today, Netflix debuted a trailer for their new show, Dear White People. On YouTube, the preview was given 2,000 thumbs up and 38,000 thumbs down. Netflix thought it would be fun to sign off on a multi-episode lecture about how racist white people are, but it backfired rather quickly.
